idea-plugin.name: java bean to ts bean
idea-plugin.description:
Support for converting simple Java beans to Typescript beans \n
Select a Java Bean file or select a single folder, then right-click, and click the "Java Bean to TS Bean" menu, select the path to save the TS file, "the target path should not be the root path", click OK, and then go to the target folder to see the generated files 1. Support for converting normal Java beans to Typescript beans,Complex Java code cannot be converted 2. The Java method body code does not convert, only the return value 3. Fields in java bean require this. e.g. 'this.name' 4. some problems： (1). Multilayer generics can cause errors，e.g. There may be some problems to convert Request<Response<Map<T,V>>>. (2). The import path for ts files may not be correct. (3). constructor ?
支持简单的java bean 转换成 typescript bean 选择一个java bean文件或者选择单个文件夹 ,然后点击鼠标右键， 并点击 【java bean to ts bean】菜单，选择ts文件要保存的路径，【目标路径最好不要是根路径】，点击确定，然后去目标文件夹中看生成的文件 1. 仅支持普通java bean 转成Typescript bean,无法转换复杂的java代码 2. java方法体代码不转换，只转换返回值 3. java bean的字段需要带有this.例如 this.name 4. 已知|可能存在的问题： (1). 多层泛型可能会出错, 例如， Request<Response<Map<T,V>>> 会出错 (2). ts文件import的路径可能不正确 (3). 考虑加入构造方法
